title: Highway to Heartache
description: "I would do great and terrible things for you." she said.Time is running out for the star crossed lovers, the teenagers thrown together by fate who were supposed to be trying to kill each other.The undead infection is spreading in Scarlet, slowly worming its way through her body.As they race across the wastelands to the last outpost with medical facilities, their fathers go to war.The Cult begins its advance on the Free States headquarters and Casey's ruthless cannibals are gathering their forces and preparing their own attack.No one gets to sit this one out.Everyone fights.
author: David A. Simpson
